decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing efficient and powerful creatures alongside disruptive spells to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. With a mix of discard spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, removal spells like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt, and versatile planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and Wrenn and Six, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own board presence. The inclusion of powerful threats like Tarmogoyf and Bloodbraid Elf ensures that the deck can close out games quickly once it gains control of the battlefield.

The deck focuses on using control elements such as counterspells, removal spells, and planeswalkers to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan. It aims to protect its win conditions and grind out a victory through card advantage and tempo plays. The key strategy involves using cards like Cryptic Command and Teferi, Time Raveler to stall the opponent's threats while setting up win conditions like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Celestial Colonnade for a late-game victory. This deck prioritizes controlling the game state and outvaluing the opponent through careful resource management and strategic decision-making.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures like Bloodghast, Gravecrawler, and Vengevine using cards like Faithless Looting and Stitcher's Supplier. Once the graveyard is filled, the deck can utilize the combo of Altar of Dementia and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis to mill opponents out or generate an army of zombies with Bridge from Below. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and resilient board presence, utilizing the graveyard as a resource to create powerful combos and win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with spells and triggering Arclight Phoenix's ability to return from the graveyard to the battlefield. It also utilizes Thing in the Ice as a backup win condition. The deck includes various cantrips and card draw spells to help achieve this strategy efficiently, with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Aria of Flame to close out the game. Surgical Extraction is included to disrupt opponent's strategies, while Finale of Promise allows for explosive turns. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed.

This Modern 1 vs 1 Aggro - The Rock deck focuses on maintaining board control and disrupting the opponent's hand with a combination of removal spells and discard spells such as Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and Vraska, Golgari Queen to further disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant to apply pressure and quickly close out the game. Additionally, the deck includes land destruction with Field of Ruin and card advantage with Tireless Tracker and Dark Confidant.

The main concept of this deck is to use the graveyard as a resource to quickly fill it up with creatures like Bloodghast, Gravecrawler, and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis. By using cards like Altar of Dementia and Stitcher's Supplier to mill cards and trigger abilities, the deck aims to play creatures from the graveyard such as Vengevine and generate value from Bridge from Below. This creates a fast and powerful board presence that can overwhelm the opponent and win the game through a strong combo of graveyard interactions.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy with disruptive spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Path to Exile. The deck also aims to generate card advantage and tempo with cards like Snapcaster Mage and Monastery Mentor. Additionally, the deck leverages powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, Vryn's Prodigy to further control the game and generate value. With a mix of disruption, control, and card advantage, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a longer game.

The main concept of this Aggro-Affinity deck is to flood the board with low-cost artifact creatures and quickly buff them with Cranial Plating to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also incorporates synergy with cards like Arcbound Ravager and Mox Opal to create powerful combos. The inclusion of cards like Experimental Frenzy adds an element of card advantage and consistency to the aggressive strategy. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and resilient army of artifact creatures.

The main focus of this Dredge combo deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures and activate powerful graveyard synergies. By discarding cards like Gravecrawler and Bloodghast and sacrificing creatures to Altar of Dementia, players can trigger abilities like Vengevine's resurrection and Bridge from Below's token generation. This allows for explosive plays and overwhelming board presence, leading to quick and decisive wins in the Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on using a combination of counterspells, removal, and planeswalkers to control the game, denying the opponent resources and slowing down their game plan. It utilizes powerful cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor, Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, and Snapcaster Mage to generate card advantage and shut down threats. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes options for dealing with various threats. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through incremental advantage and resource management.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on utilizing low-cost, efficient spells and creatures to maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The deck includes versatile cards like Snapcaster Mage and Vendilion Clique to provide card advantage and disruption. Delver of Secrets and Young Pyromancer generate threats while spells like Lightning Bolt and Cryptic Command provide both removal and control options. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistency and flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to quickly close out games through a combination of aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on using fast Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer to quickly overwhelm opponents. It also utilizes powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Karn, the Great Creator to disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck aims to control the board and outpace opponents by deploying threats quickly and efficiently. The mana base is optimized for casting Eldrazi creatures as soon as possible, with a mix of colorless lands and utility lands to support the aggressive game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and put pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage. The deck aims to chain together cheap spells like Lava Spike and Lightning Bolt to trigger prowess abilities and enable the Arclight Phoenix's recursive ability. The deck also includes cantrips like Faithless Looting and Light Up the Stage to help dig for more spells and maintain aggressive momentum.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful planeswalkers and efficient counterspells to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By using a combination of removal spells, card draw, and board wipes, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent until it can win the game with its threats like Celestial Colonnade. The key strategy is to constantly disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating card advantage and slowly grinding out a win through attrition.

The key focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting and Thought Scour to bring back powerful threats like Arclight Phoenix. Using cheap spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, along with efficient card draw and selection with Serum Visions and Opt, the deck aims to aggressively deal damage to the opponent while also controlling the board with cards like Thing in the Ice and Aria of Flame. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Surgical Extraction to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Insolent Neonate to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures, triggering abilities from Bridge from Below and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis while bringing back creatures like Bloodghast and Gravecrawler. The key strategy is to create a powerful board presence through graveyard recursion and sacrifice outlets like Carrion Feeder, leading to high damage output and potentially winning the game in just a few turns. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and explosive combo that can be difficult to stop once it gets going.
